bibl.title: The Function of Funerary Iconography in Roman Alexandria. An Original Form of Bilingual Iconography in the Necropolis of Kom el Shoqafa.
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 73 (2001), Bibl. Beilage 1, p. 36.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XVth International Congress of Classical Archaeology, Amsterdam, July 12-17, 1998. Classical Archaeology Towards the Third Millennium: Reflections and Perspectives. I

bibl.seg: GUIMIER-SORBETS Anne-Marie, The Function of Funerary Iconography in Roman Alexandria. An Original Form of Bilingual Iconography in the Necropolis of Kom el Shoqafa.

Roald F. DOCTER and Eric M. MOORMANN (Edd.), Proceedings of the XVth International Congress of Classical Archaeology, Amsterdam, July 12-17, 1998. Classical Archaeology Towards the Third Millennium: Reflections and Perspectives. I = Allard Pierson Series. 12 (Amsterdam, 1999) pp. 180-182.
Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 73 (2001), Bibl. Beilage 1, p. 36.
